name: Pong Pong's Learning Adventure: Insects and Plants
name_original: Pong Pong's Learning Adventure: Insects and Plants
description:
Pong Pong's Learning Adventure: Insects and Plants is an educational adventure game developed by DataSun Software. It came out on 01-12-2001. It was published by Global Star Software. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Pong Pong's Learning Adventure: Insects and Plants on PC.
